articles.author: Kat Bailey
articles.title: Tetsuya Nomura Says Work Has Already Started On Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3 - IGN
articles.description: In a note posted on social media, Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth creative director Tetsuya Nomura said that work has already begun on the third and final part of the trilogy, which is slated to release sometime after 2023.
articles.content:
Work has already started on Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3, which will cap off Square Enix's trilogy when it's released sometime after 2023.
Nomura confirmed that "some development has already begun"… [+3325 chars]
